titles.title: Papaya Disaster Assistance Act of 1994

A bill to provide that producers are eligible to receive disaster payments for the 1993, 1994, and 1995 crops of papaya that would have been harvested if the plants had not been destroyed, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Research.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Research, Conservation, Forestry and General Legislation

bill.summary: 2/4/1994--Introduced. Papaya Disaster Assistance Act of 1994 - Amends the Supplemental Appropriations Act of 1993 to make specified papaya producers eligible for disaster assistance.
